page.title: 07Baltasound Post Office
page.content: The Post Office serves the whole of the Baltasound area.It also sells cards and stationary.It is run by Mrs Gilda Johnson who has been working 35 years.Her day is working from 7.30 to 5.30 and involves being in the Post Office and seeing that everything like the mail comes and goes smoothly .She has to sell stamps and postal orders and hand out pensions.Her job involves a lot of paperwork,re_checking work that has gone on during the day,counting up money and ordering stamps and postal orders.She likes her job because it keeps her in contact with all the people in the community. It's worthwhile and interesting. Tuesday is pension day the busiest day. On Friday she does her balance and checks everything that has gone on during the week. Nobody else works in the P.O. except 2 postmen .
